Text: Good day to you Nepotu.  Could you upload the MLB Detroit Tigers @ Minnesota Twins game from April 4th?
Good day! I have only the game 2 (from april 3rd)
Darn.  Would it get on your nerves if I ask for a couple MLB games per week during the course of the season?
You can ask me for any game you'd like and I'll try to bring it to you. No promises.
